summary: E-commerce marketplace platform similar to Amazon where sellers can list products and customers can purchase them
architectural_notes: Multi-user system with seller and customer roles

existing_features.title: Implement user registration and authentication supporting two distinct roles: sellers and buyers, allowing users to choose their role during registration
Create a seller dashboard where sellers can add new products with name, description, price, category, and image upload capability
Build a seller product management interface allowing sellers to view, edit, and delete their own product listings
Create a public product catalog page displaying all available products from all sellers with filtering by category and search functionality
Implement product detail pages showing full product information including seller details, price, description, and images
Build a shopping cart system allowing buyers to add products, view cart contents, update quantities, and remove items
Create a checkout flow where buyers can review their cart and complete purchases, with order confirmation
Implement an order management system where buyers can view their purchase history and sellers can view orders for their products

Design a modern, professional marketplace interface with a cohesive visual theme featuring warm earth tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) with clean typography and spacious layouts that convey trust and ease of use
Add review and rating display to the ProductDetail page showing individual reviews with star ratings, reviewer names, timestamps, and comments
Display average star rating and review count on ProductCard components in the catalog and search results
Create a review submission form on the ProductDetail page that allows authenticated buyers who have purchased the product to submit a rating (1-5 stars) and written comment
Add React Query hooks for review operations including useProductReviews to fetch reviews and useAddReview mutation for submitting reviews
Create reusable UI components for star rating display (read-only) and star rating input (interactive) following the warm earth tone design system

new_feature_requests.summary: Seller account functionality - ability to list and manage products
Customer account functionality - ability to browse and purchase products
Add a Review type to the backend data model with fields for reviewId (Text), productId (Text), buyerId (Principal), buyerName (Text), rating (1-5 stars as Nat8), comment (Text), and timestamp (Int)
Implement backend functions to create a review (addReview) requiring buyer authentication and verification that the buyer has purchased the product
Implement backend functions to retrieve reviews for a specific product (getProductReviews) and calculate average rating
